ygData.subject: never enough time to say what we want to say.
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine saw a smile on the face of the beautiful female bot next to him. He didn t deserve the smile, in most ways he didn t deserve her. Thank you Wing I

Lunarpine saw a smile on the face of the beautiful female bot next to 
him. He didn't deserve the smile, in most ways he didn't deserve 
her. "Thank you Wing I promised to protect your spark and you were 
nearly offlined. I should've been better, I couldn't keep my word to 
you and now thanks to my arrogance I may never get another chance to 
hold you in my arms. I just think you should know that I lo....."

He could feal a change in himself, he didn't know what the change was 
but it fealt strange, not frightening.

What was he fealing? toon in tomorrow same Bat time same Bat channel

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::ShadowWing:;
> 
> She send a feeling of love to him,"You haven't failed me at all.  
We 
> have this brief moment to be together again. I thank the Matrix for 
> these moments."  She could see him next to her.  She reaches out 
and 
> tried to touch him.  But her hands pasted through him.  They were 
> mental images to one another.  She was still glad to see him. "You 
> have never failed me.  It is I who failed you my love.  Please 
don't 
> blame yourself.  It was all my fault.  I wanted to prove 
something.  
> And I ended up hurting you instead."  She looked down.  Then she 
> looked up at him and smiled.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > OOC Logo we'v got to do something about our timing, I was writing 
> the 
> > post while you sent yours, great minds do think alike.
> > 
> > BIC Images of Shadow Wing went through Lunarpines head like a 
Wild 
> > Fire, he could feal her presence, hear her thoughts, even it 
> seemed, 
> > smell her soft feathers.
> > 
> > "Wing? what happened to me? You're here, I'm so glad to see you." 
> he 
> > regained his composure "I mean it's good to see you're still 
> > functioning."
> > 
> > His memory flashed back in time He could see Serpentor kicking 
her 
> > unmoving body, he could feal his own claws slashing himself in 
> order 
> > to save her, all his memories collected until the moment Veratis 
> > crossed him. Lunarpine had sworn to protect Shadow Wings spark 
and 
> > here he was nonfunctional he fealt he'd failed her again.
> > 
> >
